overview: The head of the Heavenly Sword Sect, Zhao Lin, is in love with his wife Cai'er and they live a life of cultivation and immortality. But is unexpectedly attacked by Liu Wu Zhu, who was once the successor to the head of the Celestial Spirit Sect and is bent on stealing the world's greatest treasure. The Dragon Tiger Seal and the Nine Revolutions Golden Pill. In order to uphold justice and protect the peace of the world, the two men risked everything to eliminate the demons of the demon race.
title: Heavenly Sword Biography
